import React from 'react' export default function About() { return (

Introducing Text Utils - Simplify Your Text Tasks!

Text Utils is your go-to tool for quick and easy text manipulations. With just a few clicks, you can convert text to lower case, upper case, and extract emails from any text.

Features:

  • Convert to Lower Case: Transform your text to all lower case letters effortlessly. Perfect for standardizing text or preparing data for analysis.
  • Convert to Upper Case: Change your text to all upper case letters with a simple click. Great for emphasizing text or creating headlines.
  • Extract Email: Extract email addresses from any text automatically. Save time and ensure you capture important contact information.

Our intuitive interface makes text manipulation a breeze. Just paste your text, select the desired operation, and watch the magic happen!

Text Utils respects your privacy and doesn't store any of your data. It's fast, secure, and accessible from any device.

Simplify your text tasks today with Text Utils. Start converting, extracting, and optimizing your text effortlessly. Try it now!

) }
